name: Perfect Cranberry Sauce
ingredients: 1 large orange (may substitute mandrarin orange segments for ease)
1 large tart apple (Gala or Granny Smith) or a pear -­‐ can use an onion if you don't want it sweet
1/4 cup orange juice (or apple juice or mandarine juice)
2. Peel and chop the apple (or onion)
3. Combine all ingredients in a food processor, pulse to rough chop all ingredients
4. Place mixture in a sauce pan and heat to a simmer to set pectin
5. Refrigerate for up to a week
